question.instruction: Listen to the recording and answer the multiple-choice question by selecting all the correct responses. You will need to select more than one response.

template.title: The main purpose of this passage is to

options.o0: determine which food chain is the most efficient
options.o1: describe the food network among plants and animals
options.o2: explain the process of photosynthesis in green plants
options.o3: appeal to conservationists to protect endangered plant species
